skillTree.localised_description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: "To me, my winged steed of bone and flesh; let us fly and remake the world together!"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:

	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: "Who's queen? That's right… Now, prostrate yourself before me, worm!"

	(Heroes in local region)

	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Evil takes flight; blotting out the moon on blackened wings, calling us to the dance…

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

Melee attack: +8 for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: Nocturnal spectres hiding from the light, addicted to your blood.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(own army)

Passive ability: "The Hunger" for Dire Wolves and Fell Bats units
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even in Undeath, every queen needs loyal retainers and handmaidens.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -33% for Vampires
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The darkness within us all, given free rein to lust and gorge eternally.
"Come, my night-shape servants, we have a great work ahead of us."
“Rise, my friends, rise. Flesh and blood has its place, but spirit is the prize valued above all other.”

effects.description:
Speed: +30% for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

Passive ability: "Wayfarer" for Dire Wolves, Fell Bats, Varghulfs, Vargheists and Terrorgheist units
	(own army)

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.
Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

	(Lord's army)

The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed Undead units restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed Undead units restored after battle
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

skillTree.localised_description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

skillTree.localised_description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.
W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.
This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

factionEffects.localised_description: Daughter of the mad Count Otto von Drak, Isabella is much like many of her noble counterparts: she is vain, immoral and selfish, and cares little for anything that does not affect her personal comfort or standing.
